mapper.update: update honour set student = #{honour.student}, type = #{honour.type}, prize = #{honour.prize}, time = date_format(#{honour.time,jdbcType=DATE}, '%Y-%m-%d'), name = #{honour.name}, clazz = #{honour.clazz}, set = #{honour.comy} where id = #{honour.id};
